blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Could I request Shoji and a s/o head cannons? I just feel like with that many arms it would be so safe!
question: Could I request Shoji and a s/o head cannons? I just feel like with that many arms it would be so safe!
answer:
-Shouji starts out a bit awkward in a relationship since he doesn’t want to disrespect you and he’s a tad shy to initiate affection.

-So make sure to show him hugs and cuddles are perfectly fine, don’t be surprised if you have to initiate affection when you begin your relationship.

-Shouji secretly loves affection, like he loves to cuddle with you when you two are alone. I mean he has six arms, he was born to cuddle.

-Shouji is a tad self-conscious about his mouth since he has such jagged teeth (I’m basing this off of the concept sketches of Shouji lol) but, he always becomes a blushing mess when you kiss him and he hides behind his mask so you can’t see his blush.

-He is a total gentleman in a relationship, for him, actions speak louder than words. So he pulls out the chair for you and always makes sure your cares are meet. You also do the same since you want your boyfriend to take care of himself.

-To short to see something, he picks you up so you can see higher up. He likes carrying you since it brings him comfort that you’re safe and you feel pretty protected when he does as such.

-He’s just a soft boyfriend that likes to just do relaxing hobbies with you and cuddle of course!



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day! Also, thank you fellow Shouji lover for this request!!

Ophelia

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Can I have a match-up? I'm 14, nonbinary, and I assume my quirk would be some kind of shapeshifting. I'm 5'6", my hair is green,...
question: Can I have a match-up? I'm 14, nonbinary, and I assume my quirk would be some kind of shapeshifting. I'm 5'6", my hair is green, I'm practically always wearing baggy/comfy clothes. I like cuddles, drawing, making up stories/writing/talking about shows and stuff like that. I'm p laid-back, I don't like competition but I'll stand my ground in an argument >:3 oh and I'm a furry if that changes anything. (I don't have a gender preference for the match)
answer:
I would pair you up with Mina! She would be so interested and amazed to see what you could shapeshift into and probably squeals every time you shift in excitement! Mina can totally get behind comfy clothing though Mina’s comfy articles of clothing are pink and have cute designs or puns on them. Totally steals some of your clothing haha! Cuddles is an everyday occurrence, Mina loves any physical affection, so she totally cuddles and kisses you a bunch! Mina is always happy to just relax with you and watch your favorite shows, maybe play a few video games. She loves that her lover can stand her own ground and she finds that super attractive! Mina is just a proud girlfriend to her nonbinary partner, she supports you for anything and everything.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: yo, can I have a match up? I'm Female 5'0 curvy,  and very pale. I have short curly brown hair and light blue eyes with a...
question: yo, can I have a match up? I'm Female 5'0 curvy,  and very pale. I have short curly brown hair and light blue eyes with a freckle in my right iris. I have few friends and cherish them deeply (because no one likes me, yet they do?) im pretty straight forward no hesitation on truth. I'm usually the person people come to for help. I'm an artist. I'm loud.  VERY VERY loud. I'm always yelling. Uh, have a good day/and or night.
answer:
I would match you up with Kaminari! Kaminari is only who also deeply cares for his friends and would love to meet your friends and to introduce you to his. Honestly you make him feel very loved by how much you cherish him and Kaminari hopes to express the same for you, since he loves his short but, beautiful girlfriend! Kaminari is one who doesn’t mind a loud person at all since he can be loud at times as well. He would love to see your art, he would find it so impressive and amazing, I imagine Kaminari draws quite a bit as well so maybe you two work together to make a cool art piece! He just loves to laugh with you and be a very adorable chaotic boyfriend for his girlfriend!



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: In your opinion, what is/are some of the worst things Mineta has done?
question: In your opinion, what is/are some of the worst things Mineta has done?
answer: but would say the first thing that always comes to mind is the sauna scene during the summer training camp arc. but again, everyone’s been affected by his actions differently so although my instincts tell me the sauna scene, im sure someone else has a different moment that comes to mind.
